ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = A -> ( _i x. x ) = ( _i x. A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x = A -> ( cos ` ( _i x. x ) ) = ( cos ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-cosh | |- cosh = ( x e. CC |-> ( cos ` ( _i x. x ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( cos ` ( _i x. A ) ) e. _V |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cosh ` A ) = ( cos ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) |
